help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="contentTypesToCompress">
<prop type="array" name="customDomains">
<prop type="array" name="patternsToMatch">
<prop type="array<@ResourceReference_read>" name="ruleSets">
<prop type="array" name="supportedProtocols">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.
Name or ID of the origin group to be associated with.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$route.properties.cacheConfiguration.compressionSettings.contentTypesToCompress" options="content-types-to-compress">
<arg type="array" var="$route.properties.customDomains" options="formatted-custom-domains" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$route.properties.patternsToMatch" options="patterns-to-match" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$route.properties.ruleSets" options="formatted-rule-sets" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$route.properties.supportedProtocols" options="supported-protocols" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="contentTypesToCompress" arg="$route.properties.cacheConfiguration.compressionSettings.contentTypesToCompress">

<prop type="array" name="patternsToMatch" arg="$route.properties.patternsToMatch">
<prop type="array" name="ruleSets" arg="$route.properties.ruleSets">
<prop type="array" name="supportedProtocols" arg="$route.properties.supportedProtocols">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.
Name of the Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium profile which is unique within the resource group.
Name or ID of the origin group to be associated with.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$route.properties.cacheConfiguration.compressionSettings.contentTypesToCompress" options="content-types-to-compress">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$route.properties.customDomains" options="formatted-custom-domains" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$route.properties.patternsToMatch" options="patterns-to-match" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$route.properties.ruleSets" options="formatted-rule-sets" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$route.properties.supportedProtocols" options="supported-protocols" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="contentTypesToCompress">
<prop type="array" name="customDomains">
<prop type="array" name="patternsToMatch">
<prop type="array<@ResourceReference_read>" name="ruleSets">
<prop type="array" name="supportedProtocols">
